info.description:
This is a sample Petstore server.  You can find 
out more about Swagger at 
[http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on 
[irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).
info.title: Autopilot Console API

parameters.name: get_sample_ratio
parameters.description: get sample ratio of each app

patch.summary: Partially updates a topic. Note that the `status` can only be changed to 'archived', and the `integration_test_status` can only be changed to 'passed'. 'status' suppresses other modifications, and 'integration_test_status' suppresses other modifications and is supperessed by 'status'.

post.summary: Creates an Event for specified Topic.
Creates a Variation for specified Topic.

patch.summary: Applies variations of a Text RTOT Case to the topic, only update the variations of same lacale with the case, no side effects to unrelated variations.

testset_id.description: should be an id of TRSet

post.summary: Creates a Goal for specified Topic.

get.summary: Gets Rule List for specified topic_ids and audience_ids
Gets a Testset for specified topic_id and testset_id

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated, can be arbitrary combination of 'cases', 'case_summary', 'audinece', 'autotest', 'control_group' and 'integration_test' (for RTOT Popup topics only).

patch.summary: Partially updates a testet. Not all of the supported operations can be done within the same request,  'status' suppresses other modifications; and 'autotest_conditions' (for an ordinary testset) or 'integration_test_status' (for a testset of RTOT Popup topic) superresses other modifications and is superressed by 'status'; 'clear_integration_data' (boolean, for a testset of RTOT Popup topic, should always be True if provided) suppresses other modifications and is suppressed by 'status' or 'integration_test_status'.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated, can be arbitrary combination of 'cases', 'case_summary', 'audinece', 'autotest', 'control_group' and 'integration_test' (for RTOT Popup topics only).

post.summary: Creates a Testset. The API dectect the topic type and then takes corresponding actions, please provide proper body parameters according to the topic tpye (RTOT Popup or ordinary).

get.summary: Currently only supports usage on ordinary Test Results page.

post.summary: Currently only supports Case creation for a Text Rtot Set.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Access token of a Text Rtot Test, requests from the shared page should provide this token.

patch.summary: Partially updates a Case. For a RTOT Popup topic, changing Case status, changing Case integration test status and renaming ViewCase are supported; for a Text RTOT Set, only changing Case status is supported; for an ordinary testset, changing Case status and renaming ViewCase are supported. Not all of the supported operations can be done within the same request, 'status' suppresses other modifications, and  'integration_test_status' (for a testset of RTOT Popup topic) superresses other modifications and is superressed by 'status'.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Access token of a Text Rtot Test, requests from the shared page should provide this token.

parameters.name: tr_test_id
parameters.description: Required if parameter 'token' is provided (needed by finding the Text RTOT Set).

parameters.name: testset_id
parameters.description: A testset_id or a Text RTOT Set's id.

delete.summary: Deletes a Case. For a RTOT Popup Topic, deletes the corresponding ViewCase of the specified case_id; for an ordinary testset, deletes the specified Case or ViewCase (if case_id starts with 'vcase-'). Does not support deletion of Case for a Text RTOT Set.

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: topic id of a topic which supports TextRTOT

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: topic id of a topic which supports TextRTOT

patch.summary: Partially updates a Text RTOT Test

get.summary: Refreshes access token of the Text RTOT Test.

delete.summary: Revokes access token of the Text RTOT Test.

parameters.name: support_local
parameters.description: filter by whether audience support local topic

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: filter by whether audience is archived

patch.description: Note that when `archived` is set, other fields should NOT be set. We only do archive or unarchive operation on this audience in this case.

403.description: Forbidden. The user don't have access or the audience cannot be archived for it has running topics.

PatchDocument.description: A JSONPatch document as defined by RFC 6902, see http://jsonpatch.com/

value.description: The value to be used within the operations.

from.description: A string containing a JSON Pointer value.
